title: A World Apart: The Chronicles of Delilah Faylinn
description: A World The Chronicles of Delilah Faylinn by Nicole P. VicksCreatures of magical fantasy exist in the world of Delilah Faylinn. A disastrous age-old war brought mass destruction and drew a rift between the creatures of light and dark, represented by two prominent families, who had otherwise lived harmoniously.Â Now on the world of Idris resides two separate domains, governed by a joint council in an attempt to keep the peace. A vengeful plot to end the separation causes a new crisis. It is only during this new conflict that the existence of a creature plaguing Idris for eons is finally revealed, and a young girl is robbed of her birthright. The girl finds herself to be both savior and destroyer as she begins her journey to finding who, or what, she really is...
author: Nicole P Vicks
